p: The association between the number of sexual partners and positivity of serologic markers of hepatitis B and other STIs has often been reported in Brazilian studies conducted at blood donation centers, in specific groups, or in the general population. [ 15] Data available at the 2018 Brazilian Epidemiological Bulletin of Viral Hepatitis indicated that during 2017, sexual transmission was the probable source of infection in 21.2% and 9.2% of the of HBV and HCV infections, respectively. Thus, in Brazil, sexual transmission overtook drug use (8.1%), and blood transfusions (6.8%) as the source of transmission of these infections in 2017. [ 2]
